continuousshootingmode: Off / Burst / High-speed Burst / Speedy Burst 120 / Multi-shot 16 / AEB
powersource: CIPA approx 180 base on bundle Li-ion battery
flash: Auto, Red-eye Reduction, Slow Sync., Forced On/Off
accessory: USB Cable / Software & UM CD / Quick Guide
focusrange: Normal: W= 5 cm ~ Infinity, T= 60 cm ~ Infinity
shutterspeed: Auto: 1/2000 ~ 1 sec; (Night scene: 1/2000 ~ 15 sec., Fireworks: 2 sec.)
whitebalance: Daylight / Cloudy / Tungsten / Fluorescent_H / Fluorescent_L / Manual
